celestial.name: celestial
celestial.speciality1: Immune to stun and freeze. When hit by them, they gain {buffimg} {element[1].value}x {element[1].name} as a defense.
celestial.speciality2: Formed from stars, Celestials control cosmic energy. At the start, they give enemies {debuffimg} {element[0].value}x {element[0].name} using rare space particles.

elf.name: elf
elf.speciality1: Elves feel nature strongly. At battle start, they get {debuffimg} {element[0].value}x {element[0].name} but also gain {buffimg} {element[1].value}x {element[1].name} to boost speed.
elf.speciality2: They call rain when battle begins, hitting enemies with {debuffimg} {element[0].value}x {element[0].name} and weakening their guard.

orc.name: orc
orc.speciality1: Orcs have tough skin from long battles. They start fights with {buffimg} {element[0].value}x {element[0].name}, making them hard to hurt.
orc.speciality2: Their bodies release poison. At battle start, enemies are hit with {debuffimg} {element[1].value}x {element[1].name} as a toxic strike.

human.name: human
human.speciality1: Humans learn and adapt fast. They gain {buffimg} {element[0].value}x {element[0].name} early, using clever plans to win.
human.speciality2: Weaker bodies come at a cost. They begin with {debuffimg} {element[1].value}x {element[1].name}, showing their lack of raw power.

undead.name: undead
undead.speciality1: They feed on pain. By harming others, they heal. To show this, they begin with {buffimg} {element[0].value}x {element[0].name}.
undead.speciality2: Undead rise with dark energy. At the start, they get {debuffimg} {element[1].value}x {element[1].name} and {buffimg} {element[2].value}x {element[2].name} together.
